summary: This is a patches page for my mod Caranthir Tower Reborn. This page is intended to provide a separate downloads section to the main page where you can easily find patches for various mods to improve compatibility with Caranthir Tower. In addition to finding patches already created here, modders can request to have their own created patches uploaded
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]https://static.wixstatic.com/media/5813d4_c0b351b66175416c95ceb2cfc952204f~mv2.png/v1/crop/x_1,y_0,w_1349,h_300/fill/w_980,h_218,al_c/5813d4_c0b351b66175416c95ceb2cfc952204f~mv2.png[/img]

[size=5]
[/size][url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCtYB2iX9_52X_DNtSIJXyWg][img]https://static.wixstatic.com/media/5813d4_d80bd2cbe07d4509992c1bff19f6ee7e~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_60,h_60,al_c/5813d4_d80bd2cbe07d4509992c1bff19f6ee7e~mv2.png[/img][/url]﻿﻿ ﻿ ﻿[url=https://discord.gg/4WD7RCD][img]https://static.wixstatic.com/media/5813d4_49a3f7bed11e420285cb2c37fb98ad84~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_60,h_60,al_c/5813d4_49a3f7bed11e420285cb2c37fb98ad84~mv2.png[/img][/url]﻿﻿ ﻿ ﻿[url=https://www.twitch.tv/darkfox127][img]https://static.wixstatic.com/media/5813d4_17723a7d331745f8abc85b09f2842f74~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_60,h_60,al_c/5813d4_17723a7d331745f8abc85b09f2842f74~mv2.png[/img][/url]﻿



[img]https://static.wixstatic.com/media/5813d4_eb7d49b7a3a44de2b3a1f92773f66ff2~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_650,h_70,al_c/5813d4_eb7d49b7a3a44de2b3a1f92773f66ff2~mv2.png[/img]


[size=3][font=Verdana]This is a patches page for my mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76231?]Caranthir Tower Reborn[/url]. This page is intended to provide a separate downloads section to the main page where you can easily find patches for various mods to improve compatibility with Caranthir Tower. In addition to finding patches already created here, modders can request to have their own created patches uploaded here for easy access to mod users.[/font]


[font=book verdana][img]https://static.wixstatic.com/media/5813d4_5e9b2b1befb64a35b9e405d32e06310d~mv2.png/v1/crop/x_52,y_0,w_696,h_75/fill/w_650,h_70,al_c/5813d4_5e9b2b1befb64a35b9e405d32e06310d~mv2.png[/img][/font]

[font=Verdana]
Those using the Nexus Mod Manager, it should be as simple as downloading the patch you want using the usual “Download with manager” button on the Nexus and then activating the patch as you would with any mod.

Those using [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1334/?]Mod Organizer[/url] like myself should also find the process fairly simple and should already be familiar with how to use the program. You do the same as NMM and make sure the files are correct by double clicking the mod in the “downloads” list and then installing manually.

Installation for most patches should be as simple as that but any that may have a more complex installation will come with a readme file explaining the process.[/font]


[font=book verdana][img]https://static.wixstatic.com/media/5813d4_1c56735e97684b41ba40e5bbbd8ddf27~mv2.png/v1/crop/x_52,y_0,w_696,h_75/fill/w_650,h_70,al_c/5813d4_1c56735e97684b41ba40e5bbbd8ddf27~mv2.png[/img][/font]


[font=Verdana]If you are a modder yourself and have decided to create a patch for Caranthir Tower Reborn and you wish to share it with everyone else, please do not hesitate to get in touch using my website's [url=http://www.darkfox127.co.uk/contact]contact form[/url]. I can then discuss with you the patch you have created, what mod it allows compatibility for and the process for getting your mod uploaded here on the patches page.

Any patches will go through a testing stage before being placed on this mod page's file section and credit will be given and listed in the description of the file uploaded. The advantage of having your patch here is that it allows mod users to discover your patch easier. I understand that people may create patches for Caranthir Tower and upload the files themselves, which is perfectly fine, however do be aware that these patches will not have been fully endorsed by myself and no support can be given in regards to these patches.[/font][/size][/center]
author: Darkfox127 and Contributors
